definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_joins_world</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" has_entity="true" is_player_var="true"/><field name="VAR">global:CreationUnfinished</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="6"/><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7[</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§6Dragon </field></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§4Ball </field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§aMineverse</field></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§7]</field></block></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§f Press M to get started!</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
